## LiveSelector.clone() method

Clone this LiveSelector and return a new LiveSelector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clone(): LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>;
```
**Returns:**

[LiveSelector](./kit.liveselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, SingleMode&gt;

a new LiveSelector with same action

## Example


```ts
ls.clone()
```
